com.viaoa.util

Class OAProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • com.viaoa.util.OAProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>

    public class OAProperties
extends Properties
implements Serializable
    Subclass of java.util.Properties where all "names" for name/value pairs are case insensitive.
    NOTE: All name/value pairs are converted to Strings.

    This can be used for working with *.ini files.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        title - is commented title used within file.

        public String getProperty(String name,
                          String defaultValue)
        Retrieve value of a name/value pair where name is case insensitive. If property does not exists, then a default value can be specified to use.
        Overrides:
        getProperty in class Properties
        Parameters:
        name - is name of property and is not case sensitive.
        defaultValue - is returned if property does not exist.

      • getInt

        public int getInt(String name)
        Returns a property that is converted to an "int". If name/value does not exist, or not a number, then -1 is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - is name of property and is not case sensitive.

      • getInt

        public int getInt(String name,
                  int iDefault)
        Returns a property that is converted to an "int". If name/value does not exist, then iDefault is returned. if value is not a number, then -1 is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - is name of property and is not case sensitive.

      • getString

        public String getString(String name)
        Returns a property value. If property does not exist, then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - is name of property and is not case sensitive.
